textBox.richText: The Idiap research institute is organizing a tutorial on the BEAT platform ( https://www.beat-eu.org/platform/ ) during the IEEE Seventh International Conference on Biometrics: Theory, Applications and Systems (BTAS 2015) that will be held in the September 8-11, 2015 time period in Arlington, Virginia in the Washington, DC area (USA). More information here: http://www.idiap.ch/~marcel/professional/BTAS_2015.html
Tutorial on the online web-platform for reproducible research BEAT at BTAS 2015
